Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored 95 to help India win by four wickets
Daryl Mitchell made 130 for New Zealand
Rachin Ravindra scored 75 with Daryl Mitchell in a 159-run partnership
Pre-Game Insights: Hardik Pandya was unavailable due to injury, replaced by Suryakumar Yadav
India brought in Mohammed Shami for Shardul Thakur
New Zealand unchanged from previous win, Tom Latham leading in Kane Williamson's absence
Miscellaneous Highlights: India won their fifth straight match opening the tournament
New Zealand suffered their first loss of the tournament
